# About Me

Hi! I'm **Medhat Farwati**, a CRSP student at **Case Western Reserve University** and a **Cardiology Fellow** at the **Cleveland Clinic Main Campus**.

This website is dedicated to showcasing my work in data analysis and research. I aim to use this platform to share insights, analyses, and findings, particularly those related to Project B and my professional endeavors.

Feel free to connect with me to collaborate or learn more about my work!
